message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a price of $95. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we settle on $90? That's a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $87?
